data.text: @FourWinns298 According to Dr Moore's own words the current number should be 10x being higher than the rest of the graph

@FourWinns298 Cases will rise again.  Hospitalizations will rise again.  ICU admissions will rise again.  Deaths will rise again.  Hospitals will beg for help again.

Will we need another lockdown?  I hope not, but I worry we're too dumb and selfish to avoid it.

@FourWinns298 It’s not over, but it has changed.
Health depts all over the world know that you cannot stop Covid. 

If you can’t stop it, the only sane choice is to live with it.
But that doesn’t mean a death sentence…
We now have effective, approved early treatments.

It is time to pivot.
@FourWinns298 People will die and they sure as hell know it! Human lives do not matter to these Conservative Politicians! Christ! ITS CRIMINAL!!
@FourWinns298 That’s is just a chart anyone can make
@FourWinns298 @karsatov It’s ridiculous. Once again, it means that the careful have to be more diligent because of the foolish and incautious.

@FourWinns298 The messaging from our Government really does have people believe covid is over!  This is a dangerous message. I don't understand what's the big deal to leave mask mandates in place. For God's sake what's this rush to remove them? Unsafe on all levels!

@FourWinns298 PCR testing in NS has been basically discouraged, there's no way we have a true sense at the #'s. Govt told us daily cases not important.  Hospitalizations are the indicator. Hospitalizations never higher and deaths occurring 1 every 15 hours but restrictions gone as of Mar 21st
@FourWinns298 same in Europe with cases rising almost everywhere.  https://t.co/ZGlrJ9QvTY
